mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (memberno, sellno, optionno, date) VALUES (#{memberno},#{sellno},#{optionno},now())
mapper.select: SELECT po.optionno, po.optionrank, po.content, po.price, sl.sellno, sl.title, sl.thumbnail_real FROM CART c JOIN P_OPTION po ON c.optionno = po.optionno JOIN SELLLIST sl ON c.sellno = sl.sellno WHERE c.memberno = #{memberno}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART WHERE memberno = #{memberno} AND sellno = #{sellno} AND optionno = #{optionno}
